lines.content: > They Can Take Your World, They Can Take Your Heart, Cut You Loose From All You Know. But If It's Your Fate, Then Every Step Forward Will Always Be A Step Closer To Home â€“ Sora ([Kingdom Hearts 3](https://www.kingdomhearts.com/3/us/home/))
Sora stresses your mind by reminding things you need to do. It's,
- easy to learn (After One Month of Usage)
- ~~FAST~~ Negligibly Fast to use (Runs in O(N!) Runtime)
All you need to do is,
4. let it manage your tasks for you ðŸ˜‰
